forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 72. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. Southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon delights with a gentle embrace of sunshine, creating an inviting atmosphere against a backdrop of blue skies and a vibrant city. Winds whisper through the streets, bringing a playful breeze that hints at the swaying palms lining the avenues. The marine layer, usually a constant companion, seems to have retreated, revealing the beauty of the Golden Gate and the sparkling bay in all their glory. Tonight, as the sun descends, a tranquility will lace the evening air, offering comfort as temperatures ease into the soft warmth of dusk.

For those meandering the streets, lightweight layers will suffice, allowing for both comfort in the sunny moments and a snug wrap against the cooling evening breeze. A leisurely stroll through Golden Gate Park beckons, or perhaps a quiet sit in a local café, soaking in the gentle rhythm of city life. As the sun begins to bow out and twilight paints the skies, finding a spot to watch the sunset over the bay would make for a perfect end to this splendid day.
